commands.speaker: Female Student 1
commands.line: Hey, did you see the public debate the other day? Shioriko's amazing! The way she really gave it to the current president is what you'd expect from a Mifune daughter.

commands.speaker: Female Student 2
commands.line: Yeah, it was incredible. It's not like I've got any qualms with the current student council president, but she was completely overshadowed.

commands.speaker: Female Student 1
commands.line: I know, right? Uh, what was her name again? I think it had a bunch of "na" bits in it.

commands.speaker: Female Student 2
commands.line: Nana Nakagawa! That's pretty bad of you to forget the student council president's name!

commands.speaker: Female Student 1
commands.line: Sorry, sorry. But I thought Shioriko was better because she had more concrete and coherent things to say than Nana did.

commands.speaker: Female Student 2
commands.line: Hmm. I feel like I can get where Nana's coming from as well, though. Still, if I had to pick between the two, I'd probably lean more towards Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: (Of course that's what they think. Even I thought Shioriko won the debate.)

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: (No matter who looked at it, I'm sure they would think Shioriko is better for the role. But if I lose, then the club will...)

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: (No. We've just found a new goal to all work towards. Having the club abolished is the last thing I want to have happen!)

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Have you not become half-hearted in your efforts towards both your student council president duties and your passions?

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Have my efforts become...half-hearted?

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I've indeed been spending less time on my student council duties ever since I returned to the School Idol Club, but it hasn't been my intention to be half-hearted.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: Oh, Eli and Dia...

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Morning, Setsuna. Did the public debate go well? I've been hearing a lot of things lately, so I'm just a little concerned. I couldn't wait until our gathering on Saturday.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Good morning. How have you been? Since you came to us for advice, I've been curious as to how your public debate went. Please respond if you feel up to it.

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: I need to tell them both everything.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Good morning. Sorry for causing you concern. The public debate is over. I don't feel very good about it. To be completely honest, I'm actually finding it very difficult.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I had absolutely no response to my opponent, Mifune. This was not because I was not sufficiently prepared, but I believe it was because I was not serious enough.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: However, I am going to do everything I can for re-election. Thank you very much for listening to my concerns and offering me your advice!

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: (Both Eli and Dia balance their student council presidency and school idol activities well, so I need to also give it my all!)

commands.speaker: Nana
commands.line: (I'm going to hurry back to the clubroom and discuss this with the others!)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I came up with another election poster design after watching Nana's debate the other day. What do you think?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It looks good. Let's go and post this one up on the notice board as well. Rina-chan Board says, "Sparkle!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A school where we can pursue our passions. They were such brilliant words!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yep! I really related to Nana's speech more!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Everyone, look! Ta-da! I made some business cards! Promoting herself will be a breeze with these!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Wow! It's got really detailed information on Nana printed on it. Hang on, what?! Isn't this a bit TOO detailed?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's fine! She needed a little spice, so that's what I added!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You're right. Mifune successfully campaigned for herself at the debate. This is the kind of thing she needs to go up against her.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Okay, so today, we need to put up the new posters, and...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Hand out business cards! All right, I'm going to hand out a whole bunch of them!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right, then let's discuss who will do what and where...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Girls! Sorry I'm late!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, Setsuna. Perfect timing. We've all come up with new ways for you to promote yourself. See? I made you a new poster.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: And Kasumi even made some business cards for you!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Thanks for getting busy with those busy-ness cards, Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That was really lame, Ai... And stop calling me Kasukasu!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Laugh* Thank you all so much! Even though I came out last at the public debate, I...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hm? Oh, it's Kanan.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Where are we meeting up this weekend? Same time as usual, right? Let me know when the details are sorted out!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, whoops! I haven't contacted everyone about the time and place yet!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's a message from Rin.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Have you decided on the songs you'll be performing for the mini live show at the station? Kayo-chin, Nico, and I are getting it ready, so let us know when it's all sorted out!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh no, I completely forgot to let them know about the songs!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Sorry, it completely slipped my mind as well! Let's put together a list right now!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ah...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I-I'm so sorry! I'm taking up everyone's time with my election!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? It's not your fault, Setsuna. It's just that we're all a bit scatterbrained.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's right. And don't forget that everyone in 's and Aqours told us to focus on your election for now as well!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I finally understand what Mifune was saying.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: By selfishly choosing both the student council and school idol activities, I have not only divided my attention but everyone else's, too. This is what she was talking about.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Right now, everyone should be focusing on the School Idol Festival preparations, yet...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? What are you saying, Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Everyone, there's something I want to say to all of you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Why are you getting all serious on us?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I want to truly thank everyone for all of the help you have given me up to now. I will always rely on your support.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Of course we'd help you! And we'll always support you!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But from now on, I will rely on your support only in my heart.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I am leaving the School Idol Club. I will take on the student council election on my own.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: (The school I want to create is one where we can pursue our passions for our three years of high school.)

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: (I love school idol activities, and I love seeing everyone enjoy their activities, too.)

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: (Which is why I want everyone to continue their school idol activities here with their minds at ease. I want to protect this place.)

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: (Eli, Dia, I'm sorry. I wasn't able to become the type of student council president you two are.)
